name: Mark Robert
opinion: A petrol engine would give its oily pistons to have a power curve like the Arcs electric motor.

name: Jonathon Steve
opinion: I treat this as a car. I wash it, check the the oil every now and then, take it out of the garage, use it. It is comfortable.I treat this as a car.

name: Liza Frank
opinion: The bike has more than enough usable power for the road, circa 118 bhp at rear wheel, without it being overwhelming.

name: Henry Wills
opinion: As first attempts go, it is impressive, but there is no hiding the fact the initial outlay is expensive.

name: Emily Willium
opinion: If you could take price and range out of the equation, the Experia is a very impressive motorcycle.

name: Ezabela Craigh
opinion: Wonderful FUN bike for slow road riding and gentle green lane visiting. Very pretty too.
